data.author: Brandon Sanderson
data.quote: The mark of a great man is one who knows when to set aside the important things in order to accomplish the vital ones.

data.author: Christian D. Larson
data.quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.

data.author: Jon Kobat-Zinn
data.quote: You can't stop the waves, but you can learn to surf.

data.author: John F. Kennedy
data.quote: The time to repair the roof is when the sun is shining.

data.author: Parakramabahu The Great
data.quote: Not one drop of water shall reach the sea without first serving man.

data.author: Jayantha Dhanapala
data.quote: Except for the giants of history, most of us leave behind footprints in the sands of time. Collectively though, what we leave behind in institutions remains greater than all our individual contributions put together.

data.author: Philip Pullman
data.quote: You cannot change what you are, only what you do.

data.author: Philip Pullman
data.quote: If you want something you can have it, but only if you want everything that goes with it, including all the hard work and the despair, and only if you're willing to risk failure.

data.author: Philip Pullman
data.quote: Argue with anything else, but don't argue with your own nature.

data.author: Philip Pullman
data.quote: If you can't think of what to write, tough luck; write anyway.

data.author: Philip Pullman
data.quote: You don't win races by wishing, you win them by running faster than everyone else does.

data.author: Stephen King
data.quote: The place where you made your stand never mattered. Only that you were there... and still on your feet.

data.author: Stephen King
data.quote: Talent is a wonderful thing, but it won't carry a quitter.

data.author: Stephen King
data.quote: Fear can hold you prisoner. Hope can set you free.

data.author: Stephen King
data.quote: The brain is a muscle that can move the world.

data.author: Elon Musk
data.quote: Failure is an option here. If things are not failing, you are not innovating enough.

data.author: Elon Musk
data.quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.

data.author: Elon Musk
data.quote: If you get up in the morning and think the future is going to be better, it is a bright day. Otherwise, it's not.

data.author: Kumar Sangakkara
data.quote: We should not allow fear or anxiety to stop us from doing something. If you think through something well and prepare thoroughly, you can do a lot of things you think you can't.

data.author: Mahela Jayawardene
data.quote: There are no fears out there. There is nothing we cannot handle. It is just how we prepare ourselves mentaly and physically.
